openWindow.title: Open Window
openWindow.description: Indicates if the open window functionality is enabled and such a condition is met.

highMotorConsumption.title: High Motor Consumption
highMotorConsumption.description: Indicates if too high motor current consumption was measured.

lowMotorConsumption.title: Low Motor Consumption
lowMotorConsumption.description: Indicates if too low motor current consumption was measured.

brokenSensor.title: Broken Sensor
brokenSensor.description: Indicates if the device temperature sensor is broken.

childLock.title: Child Lock
childLock.description: Indicates if manual temperature setting via the rotary encoder is disabled.

calibrationFailed.title: Calibration Failed
calibrationFailed.description: Indicates if the device motor calibration failed.

attachedBackplate.title: Attached to Backplate
attachedBackplate.description: Indicates if the device is attached to the backplate.

perceiveAsOnline.title: Perceived as Online
perceiveAsOnline.description: Indicates if the device perceives itself as online (joined and receiving packets).
